ruling: - While [[Non-Spellcasting Area]] is active and [[Doitsu]] is equipped to [[Soitsu]], the increase to ATK is not applied. However, the effect that destroys [[Doitsu]] instead of [[Soitsu]] is not an effect that [[Soitsu]] gets, so that effect is applied normally. The effect of [[Doitsu]] that allows it to unequip and be Special Summoned is applied normally.
